banner: ALL GIFTS DOUBLED: Our investigative reporting cannot continue without you »
featured-promo-image-description: Support Spotlight PA's nonpartisan journalism and your gift will be DOUBLED.
sticky-image-description: Support Spotlight PA's independent, unbiased reporting for Pennsylvania and today, your gift will be DOUBLED.
support-hed: Before you go, I have a request...
support-text: We grant elected officials extraordinary power when we give them our vote, which means we must demand extraordinary accountability once they are in office. That's why Spotlight PA's trustworthy, unbiased local news is more important than ever, and why we need you now. We're independent, and we don't answer to shareholders or a big corporation. We're neutral in this polarized time, with no political agenda or opinion pieces. And we're a nonprofit, allowing us to prioritize fact-based investigative and public-service reporting for our community. Uncertain times call for decisive action, and more than 10,000 readers just like you — friends and neighbors who still give a damn about truth, accountability, and transparency — are getting behind Spotlight PA. Every contribution makes a difference. Please make yours now. — Christopher Baxter, CEO/President PS: If you prefer to mail a check, you can send it to: Spotlight PA, PO Box 11728, Harrisburg, PA 17108-1728
takeover-dek: Our TRIPLE match expires at 11:59 p.m. TONIGHT and we're $5,000 from our goal. Hurry a gift now to support independent, unbiased reporting
